reviews.review: 竞技性极强的fps游戏。如果你希望通过你的枪法、意识、配合大显身手，这款游戏是你的不二之选。
fun game when your team isnt trash but yeah its ight

Um dos poucos FPS que vale a pena jogar. Apesar do recente surto de hackers dentro de jogo, as plataformas de terceiros nos permitem contornar esses demônios retardados e com muita sorte ter um jogo livre de psicopatas depressivos que querem usar cheat porque acham que é engraçado.

Отличный шутер от 1-го лица , но и как в любых шутерах есть минусы.
-очень много игроков использующих софты , учитывая что игра в итоге стала бесплатной. До этого их итак было не мало , так теперь на каждом сервере DeathMatch-а.
В эту игру можно по играть , если на столе будет пару литров пива , так чисто расслабиться и получать удовольствие не разрывая пукан. По трезвяне в игру заходить нет смысла , ибо от вашего пукана могут пострадать ваши же дивайсы. По своему опыту знаю)

Easy to start off with, high skill ceiling. Loads of team strats. Best played with a group of friends and not alone.

Toxic community. Ensure to keep your trust factor up or you'll face even worse people. If you are playing against hackers (and there's a lot of them), report them and move on. There's tons of them unfortunately. If you find good team mates, add them and play with them regularly. Don't play to win/rank up. Play for the lols. You'll love it :)

CHEATER !!
Es ist kaum möglich ein Matchmaking oder Wingman zu spielen.
Die Cheater mit ihren Spinbots sind überall.

Auch in Prime Matchmaking rennen Aimbotter rum.

VAC funktioniert einfach nicht.

Schade für dieses gute Spiel.
The game is good for people who like a combination of action and strategy. (mostly action)

Counter Strike will live forever. Great game. 
It is simple, with great depth.

CSGO is a one of a kind game. Obviously there is allot of different tactical shooters with emphasis on team work, but none quite like cs. This  game has had many iterations before it all with the same concept. Still after so many years this game is relevant now in 2020 even more so, the player base is growing and the pro scene is bigger than ever. This game allows for some serious competitive play with friends or random russians with toaster mics. The game is in objective simple but is really difficult to get good at. Its also addictive like idk fucking heroine, and its free so its free HEROINE! Downloading this game its like accepting that green fluid from a guy in a coat in some dark alley way. DO IT ITS FREE! ps: will consume all ur time and u will get screamed at by russians.
